doc:
John de Lancie https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_de_Lancie 0 John de Lancie (born November 13, 1948) is an American actor, comedian, director, producer, writer, singer, musician, and voice artist, best known for his role as Q in Star Trek: The Next Generation (1987–94) and the voice of Discord in My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (2010–present). He has been featured in several recurring roles on television series, including Frank Simmons in Stargate SG-1 (1997–2007) and Donald Margolis in Breaking Bad (2008–13). John_de_Lancie ( born November_13_,_1948 ) is an_American_actor , comedian_,_director_,_producer_,_writer_,_singer_,_musician , and voice_artist , best_known for his_role as Q in Star_Trek : The_Next_Generation ( 1987 – 94 ) and the_voice of Discord in My_Little_Pony : Friendship Is Magic ( 2010 – present ) . He has_been_featured in several_recurring_roles on television_series , including Frank_Simmons in Stargate_SG-1_(_1997 – 2007 ) and Donald_Margolis in Breaking Bad_(_2008 – 13_) .
